GServlet API v1.0.0

Uses of Package
org.gservlet

  • Packages that use org.gservlet 
    Package Description
    org.gservlet
    Contains a number of classes and interfaces to create servlets, filters, listeners with the Groovy language.
  • Classes in org.gservlet used by org.gservlet 
    Class and Description
    AbstractConfig
    Abstract base class inherited by the filters and servlets default config classes.
    AbstractFilter
    Abstract class to perform filtering tasks on either the request to a resource, or on the response from a resource, or both.
    AbstractListener
    Abstract base class inherited by all the listeners classes.
    AbstractServlet
    Abstract class to create a servlet that can respond to HTTP requests
    ContainerInitializer
    Manages the registration and the reloading of a servlet, filter or listener into the web container.
    DatabaseManager
    Handles the creation and the configuration of the data source.
    DynamicInvocationHandler
    An InvocationHandler implementation class that must be associated with a proxy instance.
    FileEvent
    Events of this kind indicate change events for a file.
    FileListener
    Interface for receiving notification events about files changes.
    FileWatcher
    Checks a folder for file changes and notifies the listeners accordingly.
    GServletApplication
    The Groovy Servlet Application starts the registration of the servlets, filters, listeners into the web container.
    RequestContext
    Context holder for request-specific state.
    ScriptManager
    An specific class to load Groovy scripts.
